select s.*, d.dic_name_c "style_name", d1.dic_name_c "school_creat_name", u.u_name "creat_username", u1.u_name "review_username" from system_school s INNER JOIN system_dic d ON s.style = d.dic_code INNER JOIN system_dic d1 ON s.school_creat = d1.dic_code INNER JOIN SYSTEM_USER u ON s.creat_user = u.id LEFT JOIN SYSTEM_USER u1 ON s.review_user = u1.id where s.status != '0'
and (s.s_name like '%${keyword}%' or s.address like '%${keyword}%')
and (s.review_status = #{review_status})
and d.dic_name= CONCAT('SCHOOLSTYLE',s.style) and d1.dic_name = CONCAT('SCHOOLCREAT',s.school_creat) limit #{currentPage},#{PageSize}

select count(*) from system_school s where s.status != '0'
and (s.s_name like '%${keyword}%' or s.address like '%${keyword}%')
